problem:
Suppose that $a,$ $b,$ $c,$ $d,$ $e,$ $f$ are real numbers such that
\begin{align*}
a + b + c + d + e + f &= 0, \\
a + 2b + 3c + 4d + 2e + 2f &= 0, \\
a + 3b + 6c + 9d + 4e + 6f &= 0, \\
a + 4b + 10c + 16d + 8e + 24f &= 0, \\
a + 5b + 15c + 25d + 16e + 120f &= 42.
\end{align*}Compute $a + 6b + 21c + 36d + 32e + 720f$.
solution:
Let
\[g(n) = a + nb + \frac{n(n - 1)}{2} c + n^2 d + 2^{n - 1} e + n! \cdot f.\]It can be shown that
\[p(n) - 3p(n - 1) + 3p(n - 2) - p(n - 3) = 0\]for any polynomial $p(n)$ of degree at most 2.  Thus, when we compute
\[g(n) - 3g(n - 1) + 3g(n - 2) - g(n - 3),\]since the coefficients of $a,$ $b,$ $c,$ and $d$ are all polynomials in $n$ of degree at most 2, all the terms of $a,$ $b,$ $c,$ and $d$ will cancel.  Thus,
\begin{align*}
g(4) - 3g(3) + 3g(2) - g(1) &= 0 = e + 11f, \\
g(5) - 3g(4) + 3g(3) - g(2) &= 42 = 2e + 64f, \\
g(6) - 3g(5) + 3g(4) - g(3) &= g(6) - 126 = 4e + 426f.
\end{align*}Solving, we find $e = -11$ and $f = 1.$  Then $g(6) = 4e + 426f + 126 = \boxed{508}.$
model_solution:
## Step 1: Subtract the first equation from the second equation
Subtracting the first equation from the second equation yields
$$(a + 2b + 3c + 4d + 2e + 2f) - (a + b + c + d + e + f) = 0 - 0$$
which simplifies to
$$b + 2c + 3d + e + f = 0.$$

## Step 2: Subtract the second equation from the third equation
Subtracting the second equation from the third equation yields
$$(a + 3b + 6c + 9d + 4e + 6f) - (a + 2b + 3c + 4d + 2e + 2f) = 0 - 0$$
which simplifies to
$$b + 3c + 5d + 2e + 4f = 0.$$

## Step 3: Subtract the third equation from the fourth equation
Subtracting the third equation from the fourth equation yields
$$(a + 4b + 10c + 16d + 8
## Step 4: Subtract the fourth equation from the fifth equation
$$(a + 5b + 15c + 25d + 16e + 120f) - (a + 4b + 10c + 16d + 8e + 24f) = 42 - 0$$
which simplifies to
$$b + 5c + 9d + 8e + 96f = 42.$$
## Step 5: Subtract the fifth equation from the equation we want to compute
Subtracting the fifth equation from the equation we want to compute yields
$$(a + 6b + 21c + 36d + 32e + 720f) - (a + 5b + 15c + 25d + 16e + 120f) = ? - 42.$$
## Step 6: 
$$b + 6c + 11d + 16e + 600f = ?.$$
## Step 7: 
$$b + 6c + 11d + 16e + 600f = (b + 2c + 3d + e + f) + 4c + 8d + 15e + 599f$$
which simplifies to
$$b + 6c + 11d + 16e + 600f = 0 + 4c + 8d + 15e + 599f.$$

## Step 8: 
$$4c + 8d + 15e + 599f = (b + 3c + 5d + 2e + 4f) + c + 3d + 13e + 595f$$
which simplifies to
$$4c + 8d + 15e + 599f = 0 + c + 3d + 13e + 595f.$$

## Step 9: 
$$c + 3d + 13e + 595f = (b + 5c + 9d + 8e + 96f) - 4c - 6d - 5e
## Step 10: 
$$c + 3d + 13e + 595f = 42 - 4c - 6d - 5e - 4f$$
## Step 11: 
$$c + 3d + 13e + 595f = 42 - 4c - 6d - 5e - 4f$$
which simplifies to
$$9c + 9d + 18e + 599f = 42.$$

## Step 12: 
$$9c + 9d + 18e + 599f = 42$$
which simplifies to
$$c + d + 2e + 67f = \frac{42}{9}.$$

## Step 13: 
$$c + d + 2e + 67f = \frac{42}{9}$$
which simplifies to
$$c + d + 2e + 67f = \frac{14}{3}.$$

## Step 14: 
$$c + d + 2e + 67f = \frac{14}{3}$$
which simplifies to
$$21c + 21d + 42e + 2019f = 98.$$

## Step 15: 
$$21c + 21d + 42e + 2019f
$21c + 21d + 42e + 2019f = 98$

$21c + 21d + 42e + 2019f - (a + 2b + 3c + 4d + 2e + 2f) = 98 - 0$

## Step 16: 
$-a + 19b + 18c + 17d + 40e + 2017f = 98$

$-a + 19b + 18c + 17d + 40e + 2017f - (a + b + c + d + e + f) = 98 - 0$

$18b + 17c + 16d + 39e + 2016f = 98$

$18b + 17c + 16d + 39e + 2016f - (b + 2c + 3d + e + f) = 98 - 0$

$17b + 15c + 13d + 38e + 2015f = 98$
## Step 17: 
$17b + 15c + 13d + 38e + 2015f - (b + 3c + 5d + 2e + 4f) = 98 - 0$

$16b + 12c + 8d + 36e + 2011f = 98$
